definitions.text: the act of supplying fresh air and getting rid of foul air
a mechanical system in a building that provides fresh air
examples: she was continually adjusting the ventilation

definitions.text: free and open discussion of (or debate on) some question of public interest
examples: such a proposal deserves thorough public discussion

definitions.text: the bodily process of inhalation and exhalation; the process of taking in oxygen from inhaled air and releasing carbon dioxide by exhalation
